item.title: Captain reseructed
item.content:encoded:
So I went to browse all the players entries and suddenly see my alt in the playerlist here while I never made an entry for it.
Seems he had a previous life! o.o

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: thanks very much, i'll start editing now.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I'll give some examples below:

Here's how you'd do allies, jutsu and items.

 [[[allies:Billy Lvl. 2]]] [[[jutsu:Flying Thunder God Technique]]] [[[items:Sword of the Reaper]]]

Those three would look like:
Billy Lvl. 2
Flying Thunder God Technique
Sword of the Reaper

Bloodlines are a little more complicated, so I'll give you the formatting for all of them.

 [[[bloodline#legacy|Legacy of the Hero]]] [[[bloodline#redeye|RedEye]]] [[[bloodline#whiteeye|WhiteEye]]]

Those look like:

Legacy of the Hero
RedEye
WhiteEye

Actually, anything after the | sign can be whatever you want it to look like.

There's a full listing of the syntax descriptions: here.

I hope this helps! Feel free to play around with it a bit to see what works well for you.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: thanks. though i was wondering what the code is to link to other pages (bloodlines, jutsus etc.)

item.title: Excellent Page!
item.content:encoded: This is exactly the kind of thing I was hoping people would use the player pages for! Excellent job, I'm looking forward to future installments!
